themes: lack of transparency in funding processes
affordability and housing insecurity for artists
misalignment between funding priorities and artistic freedom
key_phrases: help to support housing to keep Austin affordable to artists
create venues where artists can put up work for little to no money
help keep the cost of living and producing down to a minimum for ALL artists
not just the select artists you're giving funding in any given cycle
Artists shouldn't be trying to twist their programming to fit your funding priorities
the best art gets made when artists have room to experiment and fail and still feed themselves
barriers_identified: high cost of living and producing art
exclusive funding benefiting only select artists
pressure to conform programming to funding priorities
solutions_proposed: support housing to keep Austin affordable for artists
create venues with little to no cost for artists
reduce cost of living and producing for all artists
allow artists more freedom to experiment without financial risk
